tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE TravelInformation (id INT PRIMARY KEY, destination VARCHAR(255), departure_date DATE, distance DECIMAL)
CREATE TABLE locations (location_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location_name STRING);
CREATE TABLE trips (trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY, trip_name STRING, location_id INT REFERENCES locations(location_id));
CREATE TABLE destinations (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE trips (trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY, destination_id INT REFERENCES destinations(id), trip_date DATE NOT NULL, duration INT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE travelers (traveler_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, age INT NOT NULL, gender VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE destinations (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, country STRING)
CREATE TABLE trips (id INT PRIMARY KEY, destination_id INT REFERENCES destinations(id), start_date DATE, end_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (destination_id) REFERENCES destinations(id))
CREATE TABLE travelers (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, age INT)

CREATE TABLE bookings (id INT PRIMARY KEY, trip_id INT REFERENCES trips(id), traveler_id INT REFERENCES travelers(id), booking_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (trip_id) REFERENCES trips(id), FOREIGN KEY (traveler_id) REFERENCES travelers(id))
CREATE TABLE destinations (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, country STRING, description STRING);

CREATE TABLE flights (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, destination_id UUID REFERENCES destinations(id), flight_number STRING, departure_date TIMESTAMP, departure_time TIME, arrival_date TIMESTAMP, arrival_time TIME);
CREATE TABLE bookings (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, flight_id UUID REFERENCES flights(id), passenger_name STRING, passenger_email STRING, booking_date TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE airlines (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, country STRING, website STRING);
CREATE TABLE airports (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, city STRING, country STRING, terminal STRING);
